TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBinarySerialize

summary.span: 提供自定义实现用户定义类型 (UDT) 和用户定义聚合的序列化和反序列化。

span.span: Provides custom implementation for user-defined type (UDT) and user-defined aggregate serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户定义类型 (Udt) 和用户定义聚合所需定义存储格式，可以是。`Native`User-defined types (UDTs) and user-defined aggregates are required to define a storage format, which can be either .`Native` 或。`UserDefined`。or .`UserDefined`. .`Native`.`Native` 允许 SQL Server 处理的序列化和反序列化自动，但该格式具有限制，它可以处理的类型的类型。allows SQL Server to handle serialization and deserialization automatically, but the format has restrictions on the kind of types it can handle. .`UserDefined`.`UserDefined` 允许用户定义类型和聚合以处理其自己的序列化。allows user-defined types and aggregates to handle their own serialization. 用户定义类型和聚合必须标记有。`UserDefined`User-defined types and aggregates must be marked with .`UserDefined` 在中`SqlUserDefinedType`或`SqlUserDefinedAggregate`属性，并且必须实现接口。in the `SqlUserDefinedType` or `SqlUserDefinedAggregate` attribute, and must implement the interface. 请注意，即使使用自定义序列化，每个实例的总大小必须在允许的限制，当前 8000 个字节的最大。Note that even with custom serialization, the total size of each instance must be under the maximum allowed limit, currently 8000 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Read(class System.IO.BinaryReader r) cil managed

param.name: r
param.span: 从中对对象进行反序列化的 流。

span.span: The stream from which the object is deserialized.

summary.span: 生成的二进制格式的用户定义类型 (UDT) 或用户定义聚合。

span.span: Generates a user-defined type (UDT) or user-defined aggregate from its binary form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必须重新构建您的对象使用的信息由编写方法。The method must reconstitute your object using the information written by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现方法的 UDT，它使用进行反序列化以前保留的 UDT。The following example shows the implementation of the method of a UDT, which uses a to de-serialize a previously persisted UDT. 此示例假定 UDT 具有两个数据属性：`StringValue`和`DoubleValue`。This example assumes that the UDT has two data properties: `StringValue` and `DoubleValue`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.IO.BinaryWriter w) cil managed

param.name: w
param.span: UDT 或用户定义聚合序列化为流。

span.span: The stream to which the UDT or user-defined aggregate is serialized.

summary.span: 用户定义类型 (UDT) 或用户定义聚合将转换为其二进制格式，以便保留。

span.span: Converts a user-defined type (UDT) or user-defined aggregate into its binary format so that it may be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 足够的信息写入二进制流，以允许方法来重建 UDT 或用户定义聚合。Write sufficient information to the binary stream to allow the method to reconstitute your UDT or user-defined aggregate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现方法的 UDT，它使用要序列化中的用户定义的二进制格式的 UDT。The following example shows the implementation of the method of a UDT, which uses a to serialize the UDT in the user-defined binary format. Null 字符填充的目的是确保，字符串值完全分开的双精度值，以便一个 UDT 进行比较的另一个 TRANSACT-SQL 代码中，字符串字节进行比较字符串字节和双字节进行比较为双精度值字节数。The purpose of the null character padding is to ensure that the string value is completely separated from the double value, so that one UDT is compared to another in Transact-SQL code, string bytes are compared to string bytes and double bytes are compared to double bytes. [!code-csharp[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/VB/source.vb#2)]
